```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(fpp3)
```

```{r}
medicinas <-  read.csv("medicinas.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
medicinas$fecha <- as.Date(medicinas$fecha, format = "%Y-%m-%d")
medicinas
```

```{r}
medicinas <- medicinas |>
  as_tsibble(index = fecha)
```


```{r}
#| warning: false

medicinas |>
  model(dcmp_clasica = classical_decomposition(Cost, type = "multiplicative")) |>
  components() |>
  autoplot()
```
